definition[0]: an attempt to seem more important, more intelligent, or of a higher class than you really are
example[0]: the humbleness and lack of pretension of Jordan’s cafe
example[1]: Lilith resented Adam’s pretensions to superiority.
definition[1]: a claim to be or do something
example[2]: The group don’t have any pretensions to be pop stars.
example[3]: a large village with pretensions to the status of a small town
